## Consistency Validation

### Terminology Consistency âœ…

Consistent usage across all documentation:
- âœ… **Namespace Convention**: `PrismQ.T`, `PrismQ.A`, `PrismQ.V`, `PrismQ.P`, `PrismQ.M`
- âœ… **Module Names**: Text Generation (T), Audio Generation (A), Video Generation (V), Publishing (P), Metrics/Analytics (M)
- âœ… **Workflow Terms**: Progressive enrichment, sequential pipeline, state machine
- âœ… **Status Terms**: Published, Draft, Review, Approved
- âœ… **Directory Terms**: Working directory, module structure

### Structure Consistency âœ…

All module READMEs follow consistent pattern:
1. Title with namespace
2. Purpose section
3. Workflow/stages description
4. Input sources (where applicable)
5. Modules/submodules list
6. Navigation links
7. Related modules section
